name: Box Breathing
desc: Inhale 4s, Hold 4s, Exhale 4s, Hold 4s. Resets the nervous system and expands the ribcage.

name: Crocodile Breathing
desc: Lie face down, forehead on hands. Breathe into your lower back. Feel your belly push against the floor.

name: 90/90 Diaphragmatic Breaths
desc: Feet flat on wall, knees at 90. Breathe deep into your belt line. Exhale until your ribs drop.

name: Intercostal Expansion
desc: Reach one arm overhead and lean. Breathe deep into the open side of your ribs to stretch from the inside out.

name: The Physiological Sigh
desc: Double inhale through the nose (one big, one sharp on top) followed by a long, slow exhale through the mouth.

name: Big Toe Isolation
desc: Keep four small toes on the floor. Lift only the big toe. Hold for 5 seconds. Crucial for balance.

name: Small Toe Isolation
desc: Press the big toe down hard. Lift only the four small toes. Build that arch control.

name: The Toe Splay
desc: Try to spread your toes as wide as possible, creating daylight between each one. No hands allowed!

name: Short Foot (Arch Lift)
desc: Without curling your toes, try to pull the ball of your foot toward your heel. Watch your arch rise.

name: Toe Piano
desc: Lift all toes up. Try to put them down one by one, starting from the pinky toe to the big toe.

name: Ankle Alphabet
desc: Draw the capital letters A-Z with your big toe. Moves the ankle through every possible range of motion.

name: Seated Plantar Stretch
desc: Kneel with toes tucked under. Sit back on your heels. If it burns, it's working.
